p: The total sugar content for unfed male and female Ae. aegypti mosquitoes was 0.27 µg (±0.09) and 0.79 µg (±0.28), respectively ( Supp Table 1 [online only]). In sugar-fed mosquitoes, the hot anthrone test detected 4.28 µg (±1.73) in males and 10.45 µg (±1.62) in females. Blood-fed females had a mean total sugar value of 5.86 µg (±0.39), gravid females had 7.47 µg (±1.18), and females post-oviposition had 5.96 µg (±1.12).
